text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased API Error Rates>
We are investigating increased RunInstance API error rates in the SA-EAST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased API Error Rates>
Between 11:30 AM and 12:09 PM PDT we experienced increased RunInstance API error rates and latencies in the SA-EAST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
